Author: greentea-dietcoke
Text: SO long story short (without any gross details) my dad didnt find out i was purging and the toilets working perfectly fine   longer story with the nasty details:   i was hovering like a fuckin helicopter when he took the toilet apart so i would know exactly what he knew. good news is that when we found what was clogging, my dad was gagging so much he couldnt look at it and just closed his eyes and threw the clog into the bag i was holding. he has a super weak stomach and gets too disgusted/gags at pretty much everything so i lucked out lol.   it was mostly normal toilet stuff (yknow..number 2) but the worst part is i could definitely recognize a bit of my puke after i inspected it a bit (fuckin disgusting but i had to know) so im really glad he didnt pay close attention to it, or else i wouldve been screwed.   after this scare im definitely gonna try to stop purging as much as i can because jfc i had like 17 heart attacks during this whole thing lmao
